description: This file defines API routes for metrics-related endpoints in a FastAPI application, including endpoints for retrieving metrics summaries and timeseries data for specific instances.

methods.name: MetricsSummary get_metrics_summary(instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"))
methods.description: Handles GET requests for fetching a metrics summary for a given instance.

methods.name: TimeseriesResponse get_metrics_timeseries( payload: TimeseriesRequest, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests for fetching timeseries data for a given instance.

ctags.name: get_metrics_summary
ctags.pattern: /^def get_metrics_summary(instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier")) -> Metr/

ctags.name: get_metrics_timeseries
ctags.signature: ( payload: TimeseriesRequest, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"), )
